code: function setCaller(address pCaller) checkOwner() returns (bool _success) { caller = pCaller; return true; }
reason: The function 'setCaller' does not validate the input address 'pCaller'. This could lead to setting a zero address or an invalid address as caller, which might disrupt the intended functionality of the contract or lead to other security issues.

code: function transfer(address _from, address _to, uint _amount) checkAccess("elcoin") { if (startTime > now || periodicity == 0 || auctionSize == 0 || prize == 0) { return; } counter++; if (_amount >= minTx && counter > periodicity - auctionSize) { transactions.push(Transaction(_from, _amount)); } if (counter >= periodicity) { _prepareAndSendReward(); counter = 0; round++; delete transactions; } }
